title: [Large-Scale] Virtual Collaborative Laboratory-Based Library and Information Science Research Capacity Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational information science knowledge and research methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Course supporting research project execution and professional development through smartphone-based real-time collaboration. Participants focus on designing library information services to address community issues.

learning_goals: Participants can complete a research process involving peer review and feedback using smartphone-based virtual collaboration tools within four weeks
Learners can write research proposals for solving community problems using specialized terminology in library and information science
Participants can derive and share research results through data collection, analysis, and visualization processes in a VR simulation environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
